settings.title: FriendsOfFlarum GeoIP
settings.service_ipstack_description: Use https://ipstack.com to make up to 10,000 lookups per month for free. Paid plans include connection info (ISP, organization) and threat level.
settings.service_ipdata_description: Use https://ipdata.co to make up to 1,500 lookups daily for free. Paid plans for higher usage limits are also available.
settings.service_ipapi_description: Use http://ip-api.com to make up to 45 lookups per minute for free. If you make more, your IP may get blacklisted, after which you can unban it at http://ip-api.com/docs/unban.
settings.service_iplocation_description: Use https://www.iplocation.net/ to retrieve country and ISP data. Lookup rate limits are unknown.
